long_description:
Warning: Using the weed joints can cause random minor damage to your world, so keep that in mind.

Currently this mod just adds a weed plant that you can use to craft weed joints. The weed joints heal 3 hp and seem to do nothing else... but with time they can make things 'weird' and transport you to other "realms"... :)
name: drugs
short_description: Drugs that heal and can have strange effects with time...
title: Drugs Mod
